title: rwasm 0.2.0
text: building R packages compress set TRUE, use binary R package .tgz file Emscripten filesystem image data generate custom metadata rather using Emscripten’s file_packager tool. Support new compress argument file_packager(), make_vfs_library(), related functions. enabled, VFS images compressed using gzip (#39). Note: Mounting processed .tgz archives compressed VFS images requires least version 0.4.2 webR.

text: Packages using OpenMP can now cross-compiled (#17). Prevent packages accessing host LIBS (#10). Use default shell running configure scripts (#8). Various tweaks bug fixes cross-compiling Linux host.
